Name: Oscar & Gems: Puzzle Quest
About the game: Features of the game: Move the donuts around Line up the doughnuts three in a row Move the pizza Line up the pizza three in a row Move the scrambled eggs Line up the scrambled eggs three in a row Beware of food with spikes and eyes Count your moves Come up with the most effective combinations Collect additional moves and first aid kits Go to the next level and get achievements Description: The main character named Oscar loves donuts, pizza and scrambled eggs for breakfast, lunch and dinner, after a delicious lunch, Oscar always goes to W.... In the game you have to solve puzzles find the best ways to collect three in a row and calculate the maximum effective moves.
